title: ID Capstone Des Studio 2
description: Comprehensive team-based projects incorporating an iterative approach to design development of products, & systems with emphasis on integration of research, user-centered design, prototyping, usability and testing.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ID 3032 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ID 3042 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ID 3052 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
